jml.evolution.algorithms.haea
Class HAEAStatistics

java.lang.Object
  jml.basics.Result
      jml.evolution.PopulationStatistics
          jml.evolution.algorithms.haea.HAEAStatistics
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public class HAEAStatistics
extends PopulationStatistics
implements java.lang.Cloneable

Title: HAEA

Description: The Hybrid Adaptive Evolutionary Algorithm proposed by Gomez in "Self Adaptation of Operator Rates in Evolutionary Algorithms", Proceedings of Gecco 2004.

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2004

Company: Universidad Nacional de Colombia

Version:
1.0
Author:
Jonatan Gomez
